title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, January 3, 2022
description: "A whale ship was my Yale College and my Harvard." said Herman Melville, author of “Moby Dick,” who went to sea on the whaler Acushnet on this day, 1841.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "A whale ship was my Yale College and my Harvard." said Herman Melville, author of “Moby Dick,” who went to sea on the whaler Acushnet on this day, 1841.
